title: Payroll Processing and Employment Laws
description: Specialized services designed to manage payroll processing and ensure compliance with national employment laws, helping businesses streamline operations and meet statutory obligations.

services.title: Payroll Processing Services
points: Monthly payroll processing, including perquisites and reimbursement balance tracking.
Calculation and depositing of withholding tax, provident fund (PF), employee state insurance (ESI), and other applicable deductions.
Issuance of detailed salary slips and employment tax computations through a web-enabled interface.
Provision of diverse payroll reports as per management requirements.

services.title: Tax and Deductions Compliance
points: Ensuring timely deposit of withholding tax and other dues such as PF, ESI, professional tax, according to statutory deadlines.
Maintaining detailed employee-wise contribution records for PF, ESI, and other statutory funds.
Preparation and filing of quarterly withholding tax returns and other statutory filings.

services.title: Employment Law Advisory and Compliance
points: Advisory services on the applicability of various labor laws based on employee numbers and locations.
Comprehensive compliance support under laws including the Provident Fund Act, Professional Tax Act, Employee State Insurance Act, and more.
Assistance during audits by government authorities and management of statutory audit processes.
